# ymt-node-warmup
---
洋码头Node站点点火模块

## Install
```bash
$ npm install ymt-node-warmup
```

### 使用
```bash
require('ymt-node-warmup')(server, warmFun);

server = restify.createServer();
或 server = express();
restify和express框架可以使用这个点火模块

warmFun:需要被调用的点火函数，可以不传

例:function (callback) {
      callback(new Error('test err msg'))
    }

完整例子:
var server = restify.createServer();
var warmUp = function (callback) {
                 //step1..
                 //step2..
                 //step3..
                 if (err) { //点火有错误
                    callback('test err msg');
                 }
                 else {     //点火成功
                    callback();
                 }
               }

require('ymt-node-warmup)(server, warmUp);
```
